name: Emil Bergström
core_wound: Joined police cybercrime to fight hackers and protect people. Five years in, he's realized criminals innovate faster than police can respond. He's watching his expertise become obsolete in real-time. Existential professional crisis.
wants: To find one case where they're ahead of the criminals instead of playing catch-up
needs: To rediscover purpose - maybe mentoring the next generation instead of trying to win unwinnable technical arms race
voice_markers: Technical but not condescending - patient explainer
Increasingly sarcastic and dark humor about police capabilities
Uses gaming and pop culture references
Says 'theoretically' and 'in principle' a lot - signaling gap between ideal and reality
Sighs frequently, especially when describing system limitations
contradiction: Wants to believe in law enforcement's ability to adapt, but his daily experience proves they're always two steps behind. Stays in the job anyway.
knowledge_state: Expert in digital forensics, network analysis, data recovery
Deep knowledge of ML/AI systems and vulnerabilities
Knows the dark web markets and criminal tech forums (monitors them)
Aware of police resource limitations and bureaucratic obstacles
Personally knows some criminals he went to university with - complicated

relationships.Sara Lindqvist: Close colleague and genuine friend. He respects her detective instincts. Serves as her tech translator and sounding board. Sometimes protective of her from harsh realities of how outmatched they are.
relationships.Yusuf Hassan: Unknown at start, but will recognize his technical signature in the attacks. Might have crossed paths in online forums without knowing real identities.
relationships.Katarina Ek: Unknown. Will feel sad about her case - sees economic desperation driving crime.
relationships.His team: Mentor to younger analysts. Trying not to infect them with his cynicism.

background.education: Computer science and criminology double major. Top student, recruited to police.
background.family: From upper-middle class family in Lund. Parents are academics. Some guilt about class privilege.
background.residence: Apartment in Södra Innerstaden. Has all the smart home tech but keeps it segmented and monitored - professional paranoia.
background.previous_work: Could have made 3x salary in private sector. Chose public service. Increasingly questions that choice.

skills: ML model analysis and adversarial attack detection
weaknesses: Burnout and cynicism affecting his judgment
Perfectionist - gets frustrated when they can't achieve ideal outcomes
Drinks too much coffee and sleeps too little
Considers leaving police force - wavering commitment affects long-term thinking
